snippet: Tracing the careers of the drag racers Don Prudhomme and Tom McEwen — known to fans as Snake and Mongoose — a new film spans the early days of the sport and how a major sponsorship changed it.
abstract: Movie Snake & Mongoose, due out in 2013, traces the lives, friendship, rivalry and partnership of drag racers Don Prudhomme and Tom McEwen, known universally to fans as Snake and Mongoose; film spans the early 1960s through their showdown in the final round of the 1978 United States Nationals.
lead_paragraph: Tracing the careers of the drag racers Don Prudhomme and Tom McEwen — known to fans as Snake and Mongoose — a new film spans the early days of the sport and how a major sponsorship changed it.
